description:
Alice is re-used:
	- contracts/test/EscrowMockEchidnaTest.sol#10-14
	- contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#32-36

EscrowMockEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowMockEchidnaTest.sol#79-88) ignores return value by dai.transferFrom(alice,address(escrow),wad) (contracts/test/EscrowMockEchidnaTest.sol#83)

description:
xDomainMessageSender() should be declared external:
	- MockMessenger.xDomainMessageSender() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#13-20)

L2GovernanceRelay.relay(address,bytes) (contracts/l2/L2GovernanceRelay.sol#38-52) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	- (ok,None) = target.delegatecall(targetData) (contracts/l2/L2GovernanceRelay.sol#48)

description:
Dai.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#184-208) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp <= deadline,Dai/permit-expired) (contracts/l2/dai.sol#185)
